course_description: Introduction of capital markets research in accounting. The first specific objective of the course is to provide a balanced coverage of a critical mass of important papers in this area. The second specific objective builds on the first one in the sense that discussing these papers is not only a source of "knowledge" but, even more importantly, a vehicle to develop students' own research abilities.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the PhD program.
schedule_location: M 9am-12pm in Goizueta Foundation Ctr W520
sections: Class Nbr: 5856, Section #: 5102, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 9a-12p, Instructor: I. Dichev, Status: Open
